Package com.kamontat.factory

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DownloadFactory
    factory of Downloadable for more easy to use
    To assign you need to know 2 thing First is URL of download fileSecond is String Path of direction file in place And that you easy create Downloadable by DownloadFactory.createDownloadable(URL, String) method
    UpdaterFactory
    Factory for Updatable, easy and to use but hard to manage
    This is optional, you might use directly
    VersionFactory
    since Version is needed to know both current and remote version, so this class implemented for solve that problem, so the methd that you should use is get and set method (VersionFactory.setCurrentVersion(String), VersionFactory.setRemoteVersion(String), VersionFactory.getCurrentVersion(), VersionFactory.getRemoteVersion())
    Important: This class is singleton
